row.name: UC4RB_COPY_DUPLICATE_STRATEGY#
row.xui:
<dynradiogroup alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="" id="UC4RB_COPY_DUPLICATE_STRATEGYs.00" nl="1" text="Duplicate Strategy" tooltip="Strategy to use when Pattern match with multiple files and Replacement pattern causes duplication. 
 Skip: Keep the first file 
 Override: Keep the last file 
 Fail: Fail the task" required="0"> <properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_BOND.PRV.VARA.DUPLICATE_STRATEGY</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Duplicate Strategy</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_COPY_DUPLICATE_STRATEGYs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Strategy to use when Pattern match with multiple files and Replacement pattern causes duplication. Skip: Keep the first file Override: Keep the last file Fail: Fail the task</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </dynradiogroup>

row.name: UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDES#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDESs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Excludes" tooltip="Set of comma separated exclude patterns using ANT matching rule. 
Example: **/*.log will exclude all .log files recursively" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Excludes</entry> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_COPY_EXCLUDESs.00</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Set of comma separated exclude patterns using ANT matching rule. Example: **/*.log will exclude all .log files recursively</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_COPY_INCLUDES#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_COPY_INCLUDESs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Includes" tooltip="	Set of comma separated include patterns using ANT matching rule.

Example: **/*.war,**/*.zip will get all .war and .zip files recursively</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_COPY_RENAME_PATTERN#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_COPY_RENAME_PATTERNs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Pattern" tooltip="File names matching pattern using Java regular expression. 
E.g: (.*)+build\.(\d+).(.*)" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

E.g: (.*)+build\.(\d+).(.*)</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_COPY_RENAME_REPLACEMENT#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_COPY_RENAME_REPLACEMENTs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Replacement" tooltip="Uses the '$1' syntax to refer to capture groups in the Pattern. 
E.g: Pattern: (.*)+build\.(\d+).(.*) and Replacement: $1.$3 would copy the file webui+build.12157.war to webui.war in Target Base Dir. 
If there are 2 files webui+build.12157.war and webui+build.12158.war, Duplicate Strategy will be use to resolve the situation" upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>
<properties> <entry listparam="C,N" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="text">Replacement</entry> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="multiselect">0</entry> <entry name="separator">;</entry> <entry name="len"/> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_COPY_RENAME_REPLACEMENTs.00</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="inputassistance">0</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="upper">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="showaspassword">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Uses the '$1' syntax to refer to capture groups in the Pattern. E.g: Pattern: (.*)+build\.(\d+).(.*) and Replacement: $1.$3 would copy the file webui+build.12157.war to webui.war in Target Base Dir. If there are 2 files webui+build.12157.war and webui+build.12158.war, Duplicate Strategy will be use to resolve the situation</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> </properties> </text>
